body:
HackerRank for Work user accounts is assigned any one of the two profiles: Recruiter or Developer. Your HackerRank account's Company Admin assigns one of the above profiles to your user account based on the activities required to perform in the application.

To be able to send Test email invitations to candidates, your user account must be assigned to the Recruiter profile. You are advised to contact your company's HackerRank account Owner to verify that your user account is assigned to the Recruiter profile.

Once you log in with the Recruiter user account, you can invite Candidates to Tests.

Refer to the following topics for more information:

  • Modifying permissions for Developers in a team 
  • Types of Licenses
title: Why am I not able to send email invites to Candidates for a Test?
